# Magic Fang, Superior (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Draconomicon (WotC), pg. 80

*Superior magic fang* gives every natural weapon you possess an enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls equal to +1 per four caster levels (maximum +5 at 20th level).
